nodes.text: The Coronet City Winery was a winery located in Coronet City on the planet Corellia prior to the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, when the winery was destroyed. General Adele Konya, a former member of the Corellian cabinet, acquired what she believed was the last bottle from the winery during the Sith Empire's fight to secure the Black Hole region.
